files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+-include ../tools.mk
+RUSTC_FLAGS = \
+    -l static=bar \
+    -l foo \
+    -l static=baz \
+    -l foo \
+    -Z print-link-args
+
+all: $(call DYLIB,foo) $(call STATICLIB,bar) $(call STATICLIB,baz)
+	$(RUSTC) $(RUSTC_FLAGS) main.rs
+	$(call RUN,main)

@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@

+
+void bar() {
+}
